ing: 4 medium mangos - peeled, seeded, and diced
des: "Beautiful to look at, great blend of flavors and colors, plus it is super simple to make!  Terrific as a side with Mexican cuisine!"
ins: In a large serving bowl, combine the corn kernels, jicama, mango, red onion and cilantro. Pour the lime juice over, and season with salt and pepper. Toss until well blended.
